org.codice.ddf.catalog.content.monitor

Class ContentDirectoryMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codice.ddf.catalog.content.monitor.ContentDirectoryMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DirectoryMonitor

    public class ContentDirectoryMonitor
extends Object
implements DirectoryMonitor
    Container class for managing the configuration of a Camel Route that allows content to be automatically ingested when dropped into the specified monitored directory.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Constructs a monitor that uses the given RetryPolicy while waiting for the content scheme, and the given Executor to run the setup and Camel configuration.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ContentDirectoryMonitor

        public ContentDirectoryMonitor(org.apache.camel.CamelContext camelContext)
        Constructs a monitor for a specific directory that will ingest files into the Content Framework.
        Parameters:
        camelContext - the Camel context to use across all Content Directory Monitors. Note that if Apache changes this ModelCamelContext interface there is no guarantee that whatever DM is being used (Blueprint in this case) will be updated accordingly.

      • ContentDirectoryMonitor

        public ContentDirectoryMonitor(org.apache.camel.CamelContext camelContext,
                               int maxRetries,
                               int delayBetweenRetries,
                               Executor configurationExecutor)
        Constructs a monitor that uses the given RetryPolicy while waiting for the content scheme, and the given Executor to run the setup and Camel configuration.
        Parameters:
        camelContext - the Camel context to use across all Content directory monitors.
        maxRetries - Policy for polling the 'content' CamelComponent. Specifies, for any content directory monitor, the number of times it will poll.
        delayBetweenRetries - Policy for polling the 'content' CamelComponent. Specifies, for any content directory monitor, the number of seconds it will wait between consecutive polls.
        configurationExecutor - the executor used to run configuration and updates.

    • Method Detail

      • setNumThreads

        public void setNumThreads(Integer numThreads)
        Set the thread pool size with the given argument. If the given argument is less than 1, numThreads is set to 1. If the given argument is greater than the MAX_THREAD_SIZE, numThreads is set to MAX_THREAD_SIZE.
        Parameters:
        numThreads - - the specified size to make the thread pool

      • getNumThreads

        public Integer getNumThreads()

      • setReadLockIntervalMilliseconds

        public void setReadLockIntervalMilliseconds(Integer readLockIntervalMilliseconds)
        Set the read lock interval for the Camel Route with the given argument. If the readLockIntervalMilliseconds is less than 100, set it to 100.
        Parameters:
        readLockIntervalMilliseconds -

      • getReadLockIntervalMilliseconds

        public Integer getReadLockIntervalMilliseconds()

      • init

        public void init()
        This method will stop and remove any existing Camel routes in this context, and then configure a new Camel route using the properties set in the setter methods.

        Invoked after all of the setter methods have been called (for initial route creation), and also called whenever an existing route is updated.

      • destroy

        public void destroy(int code)
        Invoked when a configuration is destroyed from the container.

        Only remove routes that this Content Directory Monitor created since the same CamelContext is shared across all Content Directory Monitors.

      • updateCallback

        public void updateCallback(Map<String,Object> properties)
        Invoked when updates are made to the configuration of existing directory monitors. This method is invoked by the container as specified by the update-strategy and update-method attributes in Blueprint XML file.
        Parameters:
        properties - - properties map for the configuration

      • setMonitoredDirectoryPath

        public void setMonitoredDirectoryPath(String monitoredDirectoryPath)
        Parameters:
        monitoredDirectoryPath - - directory path for the monitored directory

      • setProcessingMechanism

        public void setProcessingMechanism(String processingMechanism)
        Parameters:
        processingMechanism - - what to do with the files after ingest

      • setAttributeOverrides

        public void setAttributeOverrides(List<String> attributeOverrides)
        Parameters:
        attributeOverrides - - a list of attributes to override

      • getRouteDefinitions

        public List<org.apache.camel.model.RouteDefinition> getRouteDefinitions()
